ttp_template:
<group name="host_protocol_port">
Logging host {{HOST | re("\\S+")}} {{PROTOCOL}} port {{PORT | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Logging facility level: local7: informational
Logging console enable
Logging monitor level: informational
Logging buffer size: 4096
Logging buffer enable
Logging host 10.10.10.1 TCP port 514
Logging host 10.10.10.2 UDP port 514
textfsm_template:
Value FACILITY (\S+)
Value CONSOLE (\S+)
Value MONITOR_LEVEL (\S+)
Value BUFFER_SIZE (\d+)
Value BUFFER (\S+)
Value HOST (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value PROTOCOL (\S+)
Value PORT (\d+)

Start
  ^Logging\s+facility\s+level:\s+${FACILITY}:\s+\S+\s*$$ -> Record
  ^Logging\s+console\s+${CONSOLE}\s*$$ -> Record
  ^Logging\s+monitor\s+level:\s+${MONITOR_LEVEL}\s*$$ -> Record
  ^Logging\s+buffer\s+size:\s+${BUFFER_SIZE}\s*$$ -> Record
  ^Logging\s+buffer\s+${BUFFER}\s*$$ -> Record
  ^Logging\s+host\s+${HOST}\s+${PROTOCOL}\s+port\s+${PORT}\s*$$ -> Record
